amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8, 10, and 11 printed in Part A of House Report 113-465. See page D583 of the Congressional Record for Friday, May 30, 2014, for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc printed in House Report 113-465 consisting of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8, 10, and 11.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Rogers (MI).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (MI) amendments Agreed to by voice vote.
